ygData.subject: Re: Shadowknight Help.
ygData.msgSnippet: In my eye s the only choices for SK s are trolls and DE s.  Troll s have to STR and regen which makes them great soloer s and even better in groups.  Although
ygData.messageBody:
In my eye's the only choices for SK's are trolls and DE's. Troll's have
to STR and regen which makes them great soloer's and even better in
groups. Although Troll's and Ogre's are the most hated races in the game.
DE's being a little less hated...have a few more options for places to
visit. Also the high Int helps them max out the skill's quicker so they
can work on other skills. Not too mention spell's. More mana...les
fizzles.

Korm DE SK
Cazic Thule
